content.raw:
In v5 simple shapes the head joint has an origin of the following

<origin xyz="${0.2546+0.04} 0 ${0.6215-0.045}" rpy="0 0 0" />

This causes the model to visibly be off from the model.  If you assume the v4 simple shapes has the correct joint setup for the sensor head, you need to update this line to 

<origin xyz="0.2546 0 0.6215" rpy="0 0 0" />

I am not sure why the offsets were in there.
